data.name: ForkJump
data.detailed_description:
A platformer exploration game. Play with the strange innovative gameplay mechanisms. Set in a mysterious fantasy world of caves, nature and built structures. Collect the keys to proceed and find the legendary treasure.

In the game, the player has to consider physics, directions and angles to navigate through the environment. The player has to find ways overcome physical challenges.

ForkJump is:
• For fans of 3D platformer games.
• A special story about finding the legendary treasure.
• A game with atmospheric background sound and music.
• A game with innovative gameplay mechanisms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit CPU and OS
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
